room_title: Escape room "Legends of a Hidden Temple" by LI Escape Game in New York
review: Decided to come here with the family this summer and we had an absolute blast. We completed the Legend of the Hidden Temple with 5 minutes left! Brittany was the escape room host and she was very helpful and wonderful. I would highly recommend coming here.

room_title: Escape room "Legends of a Hidden Temple" by LI Escape Game in New York
review: We just escaped the wrath of the temple guards with the gold for the "Legend of the Hidden Temple" at this (well deserved) 5-star escape game! Brittney made the experience amazing by keeping us on our toes, giving us moments of clarity, and was so enthusiastic about us representing the Silver Snakes. We dug through sand, crawled through secret tunnels, and escaped with 6 minutes left! DEFINITELY using our passport to do another game, maybe even all of them!

room_title: Escape room "Legends of a Hidden Temple" by LI Escape Game in New York
review: The Legends of the Hidden Temple room was so well thought out and challenging! Great hour spent with family laughing and staying clear of the temple guards! Will be returning for sure!

room_title: Escape room "Legends of a Hidden Temple" by LI Escape Game in New York
review: Great team building with my boss and coworkers! So much fun!!! We did the "Legends of the Hidden Temple" room and Amanda and Zach were awesome!! I plan on doing a different room next time with my family.

room_title: Escape room "Legends of a Hidden Temple" by LI Escape Game in New York
review: Had an amazing time last night celebrating my husbands birthday. The staff was so friendly and the game was so much fun!! We will definitely be coming back in the near future. Highly recommend the legends of the hidden temple game!
